description: Signals a request from the game engine to the UI manager to display the save game interface. This event is typically triggered by a user action, such as clicking a 'Save Game' button. The UI manager is responsible for presenting the appropriate UI elements for saving the game. The event carries no specific data in its payload; its occurrence is the sole signal.

payloadSchema.title: Request Show Save Game UI Payload
payloadSchema.description: The payload for this event is an empty object. No additional data is required as the event ID itself conveys the specific request.
